TopicTitle: [1.0] Crash when EVA on land near KSC

Articles.Content:
Desc: Early career part testing mission landed near KSC. Chose EVA for more science. Kerbal exited successfully but game crashed as Kerbal began to interact with side of pod.

Crash dump mega.nz

I'm getting the same thing happening with 1.0.2

EDIT: And it only seems to happen with the MK2 lander can.

Edited May 15, 2015 by xtoro

Same thing happened to me on mun and minmus. If you push space and let go of pod, dont push any other buttons and let him fall. when I push 'r' after letting go of the pod on other planets my game crashes so hopefully it similar.
